Articles.Content:
Everyone has their favorite character in a video game, so what's your favorite kerbal you've had?

Mine is a kerbal named Jedrod, who went on a Duna mission that failed but was rescued. He was the only survivor.

I'm sorry to be seriously unoriginal, but Jebediah is my favorite. I mean, he's a BadS, is the first to land on almost every celestial body, and tests all my prototypes. I even killed him on a failed Mun night-side landing (didn't see the mountain!) and I nearly leaped out of my seat in joy when he respawned (at the time, I didn't know they could respawn after some time warp). I'd give the little guy a big hug if I could.
My own kerbal that I named after myself, made him a BadS and gave him stats of courage=95 stupidity=5. Jeb still leads the missions but this new kerbal generation is far more promising
It has to be Jeb - he's just a badS.

Theosey, the first kerbal on the mun in my Lunaes-K missions, an overly ambitious mission to put two kerbals on the mun and leave the descent stage, which also contains a hitchhiker. This guy is planned to be on my crew list for my Firestar-k missions( I use a mission name for each body, K if there is crew), but as I am focusing on my U.C.K.K. Save more than my K.K.K.P. save, mainly because of the Kolonation(constellation) programme.

Edited December 13, 2014 by Rolanvorxariat
Misspelled "kolonation" as "koloanation"

Theosey, the first kerbal on the mun in my Lunaes-K missions, an overly ambitious mission to put two kerbals on the mun and leave the descent stage, which also contains a hitchhiker. This guy is planned to be on my crew list for my Firestar-k missions( I use a mission name for each body, K if there is crew), but as I am focusing on my U.C.K.K. Save more than my K.K.K.P. save, mainly because of the Koloanation(constellation) programme.

So..many...K acronyms... my head spun.
